Production Object
Objects Reference
Production Object

Productions are the top-most unit of organization in a Riverside account, containing studios. Productions often correspond to a team or initiative.

id Unique identifier for the production.

name Name of the production.

created_date Date when the production was created.

studios List of studios associated with the production.

num_recordings Count of recordings associated with the production.

Delete Recording
